content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone furnace group at positions (41.0, -80.0) and (42.0, -79.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position (41.0, -80.0) with inventory containing iron-plate and iron-ore.
- Stone furnace at position (42.0, -79.0) with inventory containing iron-plate and iron-ore.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Repeated insertion errors into furnaces
- Check the inventory of the furnace before inserting items to avoid unnecessary insertions when the furnace is already at capacity.
